meanings.definition: A skin condition characterized by itchy papules or nodules.
meanings.sent1: The doctor diagnosed the patient with prurigos after examining the itchy bumps on their skin.
meanings.sent2: Many people suffer from prurigos, which can cause discomfort and irritation.
meanings.sent3: The prurigos on his skin made him feel like he was covered in tiny, annoying bugs.
meanings.sent4: Her prurigos were like little volcanoes of itchiness waiting to erupt.
meanings.sent5: The relentless itchiness of prurigos kept him up all night scratching.

meanings.sent1: The dermatologist studied various cases of prurigos to understand the different manifestations of the condition.
meanings.sent2: In the medical report, the term 'prurigos' was used to refer to multiple instances of prurigo.
meanings.sent3: The prurigos in the textbook seemed to multiply every time she turned the page.
meanings.sent4: The prurigos in the clinic waiting room were a reminder of the prevalence of skin conditions.
meanings.sent5: The shelves in the pharmacy were stocked with creams for treating prurigos.
